common.signInToAccount: Sign in to your account to continue your IELTS journey

introduction.masterAllSkills: Master all skills with a high-quality
introduction.trainingProgram: training program tailored to your goals
introduction.learningEasy: Learning a foreign language is easy with a comprehensive, personalized Study & Test Preparation plan designed specifically for your needs.
introduction.listeningDesc: Enhance your listening skills with expert feedback. Improve your comprehension and response time with every lesson!
introduction.readingDesc: Master reading comprehension strategies. Learn to analyze complex texts and answer questions with precision and confidence.
introduction.writingDesc: Build a solid foundation from the basics. Practice writing with AI and see noticeable progress with each lesson.
introduction.speakingDesc: Communicate flexibly with highly practical topics. Practice and receive corrections in various real-world scenarios.
introduction.readyToImprove: Ready to improve your IELTS score?
introduction.takeFreeAssessment: Take a free assessment test to see your current level

course.aiPoweredSystem: Our AI-powered system creates a customized roadmap based on your current level and target score.
